EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-07-20-AWS-Price-Performance Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending The {{my.Resource Name}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending the Navigating Amazon Web Services Performance and Price Webinar. We hope you left with some useful takeaways!
Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-aws-performance-price/]]>.
If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <[[mailto:evalteam@vmturbo.com]]>. - The VMTurbo Team
